Name: Nantucket
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Essentially a Seabreeze with rum in place of vodka.
History: Popularised by the USA Cheers Bar chain, this is named after the beautiful island off Cape Cod.
Nutrition: One serving of Nantucket contains 143 calories
